# aoxpress + ao-fetch

[![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/ao--fetch-a?style=flat&logo=npm&logoColor=red&color=lightgreen&link=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.npmjs.com%2Fpackage%2Fao-fetch)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/ao-fetch)
[![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/aoxpress-a?style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoColor=white&color=2a3f4e&link=https%3A%2F%2Fapm.betteridea.dev%2Fpkg%3Fid%3D%40apm%2Faoxpress)](https://apm.betteridea.dev/pkg?id=@apm/aoxpress)

Framework to define handlers and call them from the frontend using a syntax that's similar to writing and calling express apis

## Overview

This Framework consists of two main components:

1. **aoxpress**: An [APM](https://apm.betteridea.dev) package for defining handlers with syntax similar to expressjs
2. **ao-fetch**: An [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/ao-fetch) library for communicating with AO processes from JS/TS

## Documentation

- [aoxpress](https://github.com/ankushKun/aoxpress/blob/main/aoxpress/README.md)
- [ao-fetch](https://github.com/ankushKun/aoxpress/blob/main/ao-fetch/README.md)
- [Demo Usage](https://github.com/ankushKun/aoxpress/tree/main/demo)
